commit.message: chore: Bump version to 1.1.0 for .NET 10.0 LTS release
docs: Update README files for .NET 10.0 LTS support

Add session-based theme switching for UI and syntax

Implemented user-selectable Bootswatch and PrismSpark themes with session persistence. Added ThemeService, ThemeController, and middleware to manage theme and color mode per session. Introduced a UI theme selector dropdown for real-time theme switching and reset. Enhanced Pug syntax highlighting and registered a new "yeti" PrismSpark theme. Updated NuGet packages and project configuration.

Add PUG syntax highlighting support and demo page

- Implemented PUG grammar definition for syntax highlighting.
- Added PugDemo action in HomeController to showcase PUG syntax highlighting.
- Created PugDemo view to display raw PUG code alongside highlighted output.
- Updated layout to include navigation link for PUG demo.
- Enhanced CodeSnippet model to support new PUG language.
- Added unit tests for PUG features to ensure proper tokenization.
- Updated README to reflect new features and usage examples for PUG.

Update CI, enhance controllers, and improve UI/UX

- Streamlined CI configuration in `ci.yml` with new environment variable.
- Added `Index` action to `HomeController` and introduced `JokeController`.
- Enhanced `Program.cs` for HTTPS redirection and service registration.
- Added `FolderProfile.pubxml` for publishing settings.
- Revamped `Demo.cshtml` and `Index.cshtml` for better code highlighting and navigation.
- Updated `Privacy.cshtml` for a clearer privacy policy.
- Modified `_Layout.cshtml` for improved navigation and footer design.
- Configured Kestrel endpoints in `appsettings.json`.
- Added `Robots.txt` for web crawler management.
- Included various binary files for branding and web app support.
- Introduced `site.webmanifest` for mobile user experience enhancements.

Add live code editor feature and UI enhancements

- Implemented new `Edit` action in `HomeController.cs` for the live code editor.
- Updated `Index.cshtml` to link to the live editor and removed the old editor section.
- Modified `Layout.cshtml` to include navigation for the live editor and added Bootstrap Icons.
- Enhanced `site.css` with new styles for the live editor and consolidated focus styles.
- Created `Edit.cshtml` for the live code editor layout, including statistics and editor controls.
- Introduced `prismSpark.js` for client-side functionality, including validation and formatting.
- Overall improvements to user experience with interactive syntax highlighting and validation.
Update CI workflow and project file for .NET 9.0 support; upgraded action versions and improved configuration.
Refactor code structure for improved readability and maintainability; removed redundant code blocks and optimized function calls.
